video.title: Glee
video.synopsis: Amid relationship woes and personal attacks from a wicked cheerleading coach, a teacher fights to turn underdog glee club members into winners.

episodes.synopsis: High school teacher Will Schuester tries to reinvent McKinley High School's Glee Club and get its outcast members to realize their star potential.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Glee Club performs in front of the school for the first time and surprises everyone in the audience. Meanwhile, Rachel realizes her feelings for Finn.
episodes.title: Showmance

episodes.synopsis: Will forms the Acafellas, an all-male a cappella vocal group, spending more time building his own confidence and more time away from Glee Club.
episodes.title: Acafellas

episodes.synopsis: Kurt tries out for the football team in order to impress his dad. Sandy and Sue join forces to carry out their plans for destroying Glee Club.
episodes.title: Preggers

episodes.synopsis: Will thinks Glee Club desperately needs more of an edge, so he brings in his former classmate, April Rhodes, to spice things up.
episodes.title: The Rhodes Not Taken

episodes.synopsis: Will challenges the kids to a mash-up showdown. Meanwhile, Terri takes a job as the school nurse and hands out pills like they're candy.
episodes.title: Vitamin D

episodes.synopsis: Sue tries to cause dissension among the Glee Club members, but the real showdown begins when she and Will get called into the principal's office.
episodes.title: Throwdown

episodes.synopsis: Inspired by the students, Will composes a mash-up for a very special occasion. Meanwhile, in a shocking reversal of roles, Sue shows her softer side.
episodes.title: Mash-Up

episodes.synopsis: When Artie may not be able to travel with the group to Regionals, Will challenges the kids to experience life from a different point of view.
episodes.title: Wheels

episodes.synopsis: Will splits Glee Club into pairs to sing ballads, but when one kid gets sick, Will is forced to step in and winds up in a sticky situation.
episodes.title: Ballad

episodes.synopsis: Concerned that Sue is up to no good, Will pays a visit to an instructor of a competing glee club to see what information she might be leaking.
episodes.title: Hairography

episodes.synopsis: When Glee Club is left out of the yearbook because of budget cuts, everyone's relieved that they won't have to suffer the ridicule of years past.
episodes.title: Mattress

episodes.synopsis: Sectionals is finally here for the Glee Club, but when Quinn's secret unravels, the club may not be able to recover in time to compete.
episodes.title: Sectionals

episodes.synopsis: With an extra spring in their step, Glee Club works on new numbers for Regionals, but their efforts are undermined by Rachel and Finn's rocky romance.
episodes.title: Hell-O

episodes.synopsis: Concerned that the Glee Club girls are being bullied by the guys, Mr. Schuester challenges the kids to choose Madonna songs as their next assignment.
episodes.title: The Power of Madonna

episodes.synopsis: When Kurt sets his dad, Burt, up with an unexpected partner, his plan for a nuclear family may backfire.
episodes.title: Home

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Schuester starts an investigation when a salacious list about members of the Glee Club circulates the halls of McKinley High.
episodes.title: Bad Reputation

episodes.synopsis: When a sore throat affects Rachel's singing voice, she goes into panic mode. Meanwhile, Kurt tries to change his persona to impress his father.
episodes.title: Laryngitis

episodes.synopsis: In an episode directed by Emmy Award winner Joss Whedon, Mr. Schuester's former high school nemesis, Bryan Ryan, causes trouble for Glee Club.
episodes.title: Dream On

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Schuester encourages the Glee Club kids to express themselves using the music of Lady Gaga. Meanwhile, Tina embraces her inner Goth.
episodes.title: Theatricality

episodes.synopsis: Glee Club gets some bad news. Meanwhile, Mercedes helps Quinn connect with her funky side, and Will gets revenge on Sue.
episodes.title: Funk

episodes.synopsis: The moment New Directions has been waiting for has arrived: Regionals! But when Sue pulls a fast one, their chances at the title could be compromised.
episodes.title: Journey to Regionals

episodes.synopsis: New faces challenge some Glee Club veterans during auditions, while new and old relationships leave some feeling happy -- and others sad.
episodes.title: Audition

episodes.synopsis: Brittany has hallucinations while at the dentist and channels her inner Britney Spears. Rachel fears her relationship with Finn could be in peril.
episodes.title: Britney/Brittany

episodes.synopsis: Finn thinks he sees the face of Jesus in a grilled cheese sandwich, and random events have the members of the Glee Club questioning religion and God.
episodes.title: Grilled Cheesus

episodes.synopsis: Will Schuester's duet challenge, with a free meal for the winners, causes some relationship issues between the members of the club.
episodes.title: Duets

episodes.synopsis: Will assigns the Glee Club to perform "The Rocky Horror Picture Show" for the school musical after learning of Emma's newfound love for the cult film.
episodes.title: The Rocky Horror Glee Show

episodes.synopsis: Will Schuester hosts the second annual Boys vs. Girls competition, while Puck finally gets out of juvenile detention.
episodes.title: Never Been Kissed

episodes.synopsis: A substitute teacher takes over for an ill Will Schuester and wows the group with her unconventional teaching methods.
episodes.title: The Substitute

episodes.synopsis: Sue's mother comes to visit, bringing some surprising revelations. Sam tells Quinn he's in love with her and offers her a promise ring.
episodes.title: Furt

episodes.synopsis: New Directions faces fierce competition against the Hipsters and Warblers. Finn and Rachel and Emma and Carl experience relationship trouble.
episodes.title: Special Education

episodes.synopsis: Finn tries to get everyone at McKinley High into the holiday spirit. Sue paints herself up as the Grinch to steal back presents.
episodes.title: A Very Glee Christmas

episodes.synopsis: A huge halftime performance is planned during the championship football game at McKinley High. Sue's Cheerios have trouble at the Regionals.
episodes.title: The Sue Sylvester Shuffle

episodes.synopsis: Will gives the New Directions their next assignment: love songs! Finn and Quinn begin an affair, while Blaine sings a love song to his crush.
episodes.title: Silly Love Songs

episodes.synopsis: Sue is depressed since her loss at Regionals. Brittany starts a new fashion trend at school to the dismay of Rachel who showed her what to wear.
episodes.title: Comeback

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Schuester has the Glee Club perform a song about underage drinking, but the message might lose impact when they come to school with hangovers.
episodes.title: Blame It On The Alcohol

episodes.synopsis: Holly Holliday returns to McKinley High to teach sex education to the students. Puck and Lauren join the celibacy club.
episodes.title: Sexy

episodes.synopsis: New Directions wants to get an edge at the Regionals and decides to use original songs. Blaine wants to try a new strategy during Regionals.
episodes.title: Original Song

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Schuester tries to come up with ways to raise money to send the kids to the Nationals. Sandy forms "the Heckling Club" with eyes on the glee team.
episodes.title: A Night Of Neglect

episodes.synopsis: Finn accidentally breaks Rachel's nose during dance rehearsals. The campaign to become prom queen heats up between the girls.
episodes.title: Born This Way

episodes.synopsis: Brittany's new Internet talk show spreads like wildfire around the school. April returns to McKinley High after an unsuccessful attempt on Broadway.
episodes.title: Rumours

episodes.synopsis: New Directions are asked to perform at the prom after Air Supply cancels. The students scramble to get dates for the prom.
episodes.title: Prom Queen

episodes.synopsis: Coach Sylvester tries to sabotage the New Directions' trip to New York. The Glee Club performs songs at a funeral. Finn has bad news for Quinn.
episodes.title: Funeral

episodes.synopsis: The Glee Club gets ready to perform at the Nationals in New York. Finn and Rachel have an emotional moment on stage during the competition.
episodes.title: New York

episodes.synopsis: The New Directions clan returns after a devastating loss at Nationals, so Mr. Schuester assigns them a project to get them back on track.
episodes.title: The Purple Piano Project

episodes.synopsis: Shelby Corcoran returns to the halls of McKinley High. Meanwhile, Mr. Schuester initiates a boot camp for some of the members of New Directions.
episodes.title: I Am Unicorn

episodes.synopsis: Rusty and Rose Pillsbury pay Emma a visit and we get a sneak peek into her deep-rooted issues. Meanwhile, Mike Chang struggles with his grades.
episodes.title: Asian F

episodes.synopsis: Rory Flanagan, a new foreign exchange student, enrolls at McKinley and crashes with Brittany, who thinks he's a leprechaun.
episodes.title: Pot o' Gold

episodes.synopsis: Under Artie's directorial leadership, the kids prepare to perform the school musical "West Side Story." Meanwhile, Finn meets with a recruiter.
episodes.title: The First Time

episodes.synopsis: Sue starts a smear campaign to take down her biggest competitor for the congressional seat.
episodes.title: Mash Off

episodes.synopsis: As the race for McKinley High president comes to an end, someone is caught trying to fix the results.
episodes.title: I Kissed a Girl

episodes.synopsis: In an attempt to recruit a few more members, Finn tracks down former teammate Sam Evans and convinces him to come back to the glee club.
episodes.title: Hold On to Sixteen

episodes.synopsis: When New Directions is asked to perform at two different events -- on the same day, at the same time -- they have a tough decision to make.
episodes.title: Extraordinary Merry Christmas

episodes.synopsis: When Will tries to plan a special surprise for Emma, he enlists the glee club to help him sweep her off her feet.
episodes.title: Yes/No

episodes.synopsis: The rivalry between New Directions and the Warblers intensifies en route to Regionals, and Kurt and Rachel receive news about NYADA.
episodes.title: Michael

episodes.synopsis: Will assigns the glee club a Spanish singing assignment and enlists the help of his musically inclined night school teacher.
episodes.title: The Spanish Teacher

episodes.synopsis: In honor of Valentine's Day, Will challenges New Directions to find and perform the world's greatest love songs.
episodes.title: Heart

episodes.synopsis: Things heat up as New Directions goes head-to-head with the Dalton Academy Warblers at Regionals.
episodes.title: On My Way

episodes.synopsis: Much to Blaine's chagrin, his big-shot Hollywood actor brother, Cooper, comes to visit.
episodes.title: Big Brother

episodes.synopsis: New Directions pays homage to the movie Saturday Night Fever by grooving to disco-infused dance numbers.
episodes.title: Saturday Night Glee-ver

episodes.synopsis: The glee club pays homage to a true icon when they cover Whitney Houston's greatest hits. Emma and Will are one step closer to their dream wedding.
episodes.title: Dance With Somebody

episodes.synopsis: Rachel and Kurt finally get their chance to audition for the New York Academy of the Dramatic Arts.
episodes.title: Choke

episodes.synopsis: Brittany goes into high gear as class president to spearhead the prom. Then, after nominations are announced, the kids kick into campaign mode.
episodes.title: Prom-A-Saurus

episodes.synopsis: When Tina bumps her head, the world of New Directions is turned upside down in her eyes.
episodes.title: Props

episodes.synopsis: Sue and the Glee girls tend to Mercedes, who has a nasty case of food poisoning. Will drafts Tina and a nervous, reluctant Quinn to sub for Mercedes.
episodes.title: Nationals

episodes.synopsis: Graduation is finally here, and McKinley High's class of 2012 looks to the past and present while contemplating the future.
episodes.title: Goodbye

episodes.synopsis: In the season premiere, the members of New Directions compete to become the next star of the glee club, and a fresh crop of students is introduced.
episodes.title: The New Rachel

episodes.synopsis: Brittany Pierce is in a funk and turns to Britney Spears' music for inspiration. Meanwhile, Rachel struggles to adjust to life in New York City.
episodes.title: Britney 2.0

episodes.synopsis: The campaign showdown begins when Brittany and Blaine go head-to-head for student council president. Meanwhile, Kurt lands his dream internship.
episodes.title: Makeover

episodes.synopsis: In New York City, unexpected visitors catch Rachel and Kurt off guard. Meanwhile, Santana and Brittany adjust to their long-distance relationship.
episodes.title: The Break-Up

episodes.synopsis: As auditions for the school production of "Grease" get under way, Marley, Jake, Kitty and football player Ryder compete for the lead roles.
episodes.title: The Role You Were Born to Play

episodes.synopsis: Rachel and Kurt pay a visit to Lima as the glee club launches its production of "Grease." Meanwhile, Santana comes back to lend a helping hand.
episodes.title: Glease

episodes.synopsis: Marley, Jake and Ryder find themselves in the midst of a love triangle. Meanwhile, Blaine has a run-in with the Warblers.
episodes.title: Dynamic Duets

episodes.synopsis: Some McKinley alumni give New Directions advice about Sectionals. Elsewhere, Rachel and Kurt have a nontraditional Thanksgiving dinner.
episodes.title: Thanksgiving

episodes.synopsis: As New Directions regroups after Sectionals, Finn ponders his future with the club. Meanwhile, Kurt gets a shot at redemption with a second audition.
episodes.title: Swan Song

episodes.synopsis: As 2012 draws to a close, Sam and Brittany live life to the fullest before the Mayan apocalypse. Meanwhile, Kurt has a Christmas he'll never forget.
episodes.title: Glee, Actually

episodes.synopsis: The glee club girls organize a Sadie Hawkins dance at McKinley High. Meanwhile, Sam looks for evidence that the Warblers cheated at Sectionals.
episodes.title: Sadie Hawkins

episodes.synopsis: The glee club puts together a calendar photo shoot for a fundraiser. Meanwhile, a part in a student art film poses a moral dilemma for Rachel.
episodes.title: Naked

episodes.synopsis: Finn challenges the glee club members to find their inner powerhouses for "Diva Week." Meanwhile, Emma prepares for her upcoming wedding.
episodes.title: Diva

episodes.synopsis: Will and Emma tie the knot on Valentine's Day, with current and former members of New Directions reuniting in Lima to celebrate.
episodes.title: I Do

episodes.synopsis: As everyone recovers from Will and Emma's wedding, the glee club members are tasked with performing their favorite movie songs.
episodes.title: Girls (and Boys) on Film

episodes.synopsis: The students give Will and Finn an assignment to work out the tension between them. Meanwhile, Santana is suspicious about Brody's side job.
episodes.title: Feud

episodes.synopsis: The members of New Directions perform songs that they're ordinarily too embarrassed to admit that they love.
episodes.title: Guilty Pleasures

episodes.synopsis: As the members of New Directions prepare for Regionals, an unthinkable event occurs and puts matters into perspective.
episodes.title: Shooting Star

episodes.synopsis: New Directions gets ready for Regionals, where "Dreams" will be the theme. Meanwhile, Rachel auditions for a Broadway revival of "Funny Girl."
episodes.title: Sweet Dreams

episodes.synopsis: When the power goes out at McKinley High, the members of New Directions "unplug" and perform acoustic numbers.
episodes.title: Lights Out

episodes.synopsis: The members of New Directions perform Stevie Wonder's greatest hits. Meanwhile, Artie receives news that could affect his future.
episodes.title: Wonder-ful

episodes.synopsis: It's time for Regionals, and the glee club is more determined than ever to advance to Nationals. Meanwhile, Brittany returns with a new attitude.
episodes.title: All or Nothing

episodes.synopsis: The members of New Directions take on an homage to the Beatles, singing classics like "Yesterday," "Drive My Car" and "A Hard Day's Night."
episodes.title: Love, Love, Love

episodes.synopsis: Beatlemania continues at McKinley, and it's voting time for prom queen and king. But when Tina gets nominated, her attitude alienates her supporters.
episodes.title: Tina in the Sky with Diamonds

episodes.synopsis: The McKinley family of the past and present celebrate the life of Finn Hudson with musical performances like "Seasons of Love" and "Fire & Rain."
episodes.title: The Quarterback

episodes.synopsis: The members of New Directions get out of their comfort zone with the assignment of deciding whether they're more of a Katy Perry or a Lady Gaga.
episodes.title: A Katy or a Gaga

episodes.synopsis: The glee club learns to twerk, while Marley discovers Jake and Bree's relationship and Rachel tries to convince Kurt that they should get tattoos.
episodes.title: The End of Twerk

episodes.synopsis: As graduation nears, the seniors make plans for their future, while New Directions pays homage to Billy Joel with performances such as "Movin' Out."
episodes.title: Movin' Out

episodes.synopsis: The students accuse Blaine of being too controlling in his plan to win Nationals, and Kurt also runs into control issues over the band's first gig.
episodes.title: Puppet Master

episodes.synopsis: The New Directions audition for roles in McKinley’s living nativity scene, while Rachel, Kurt and Santana work as Santa’s elves at a New York mall.
episodes.title: Previously Unaired Christmas

episodes.synopsis: Santana wins the role of Rachel's understudy in "Funny Girl" while back in Lima, Tina and Artie compete against each other for class valedictorian.
episodes.title: Frenemies

episodes.synopsis: As graduation nears, Tina, Blaine and Sam try to savor their final days together, while Elliot gets in the middle of Rachel and Santana’s feud.
episodes.title: Trio

episodes.synopsis: The members of New Directions travel to sunny Los Angeles to compete in Nationals and bring two special guests with them.
episodes.title: City of Angels

episodes.synopsis: Current and past members of New Directions reunite to perform new renditions of their favorite performances, which include "Toxic" and "Valerie."
April and Holly hatch a plan to save New Directions as the glee club's fate nears, while Rachel and Santana try to make amends after their big fight.
episodes.title: New Directions

episodes.synopsis: New Directions alumni are adjusting to their new lives in the Big Apple a few months after the end of glee club, but life isn't perfect for all.
episodes.title: New New York

episodes.synopsis: Rachel takes the next step in committing to her role in “Funny Girl," while Kurt is the victim of an hate crime based on his sexual preference.
episodes.title: Bash

episodes.synopsis: Artie tests positive for an STD and is forced to tell his sexual partners, while Kurt and Blaine have relationship issues.
episodes.title: Tested

episodes.synopsis: The night for Rachel’s Broadway debut in “Funny Girl” has arrived and she has special guests in town to support her career-defining moment.
episodes.title: Opening Night

episodes.synopsis: Rachel jeopardizes her “Funny Girl" lead, Mercedes tries to help Santana with her recording deal and Blaine befriends an older, rich socialite.
episodes.title: The Back-Up Plan

episodes.synopsis: Rachel tries to salvage her reputation by creating a charity for rescue animals and Kurt nabs the lead in a retirement home production of “Peter Pan.”
episodes.title: Old Dog, New Tricks

episodes.synopsis: An eccentric television writer catches Rachel off guard, Sam and Mercedes feel the pressure of commitment and it's time for Blaine's big showcase.
episodes.title: The Untitled Rachel Berry Project

episodes.synopsis: The vocal landscape in Lima gets a makeover as Rachel leads the New Directions, Blaine coaches the Warblers, and Mr. Schue directs Vocal Adrenaline.
episodes.title: Loser Like Me

episodes.synopsis: Alums Puck, Quinn, Santana, Mercedes, Brittany, Artie and Tina return to McKinley to help Rachel and Kurt recruit for the newly resurrected glee club.
episodes.title: Homecoming

episodes.synopsis: Rachel and Kurt butt heads over the direction of the New Directions. Meanwhile, Becky returns to McKinley with a new boyfriend in tow.
episodes.title: Jagged Little Tapestry

episodes.synopsis: With an invitational approaching, Sue does her best to sabotage both Rachel and Will -- not to mention Blaine and Karofsky's relationship.
episodes.title: The Hurt Locker: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: While Sue meddles to reunite "Klaine," Kitty and Rachel work on the set list for the invitational and Sam enlists a football player for the glee club.
episodes.title: The Hurt Locker: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: As Santana and Brittany prepare for their wedding, Rachel and Sam waffle about romance and Mercedes returns to Lima with ulterior motives.
episodes.title: What the World Needs Now

episodes.synopsis: Will takes desperate measures to teach the bullies of Vocal Adrenaline about tolerance; Rachel finds out her childhood home has been sold.
episodes.title: Transitioning

episodes.synopsis: As Brittany and Santana prepare for their big day, a surprisingly kinder, gentler Sue encourages everyone to follow their hearts.
episodes.title: A Wedding

episodes.synopsis: A demanding tween requests that New Directions perform at his bar mitzvah, and the glee club must band together for its first public performance.
episodes.title: Child Star

episodes.synopsis: When Dalton Academy burns to the ground, the Warblers must combine with New Directions; Rachel begs Carmen Tibideaux to let her return to NYADA.
episodes.title: The Rise and Fall of Sue Sylvester

episodes.synopsis: New Directions and the Warblers compete at sectionals; Rachel must choose between returning to NYADA and performing on Broadway with a past love.
episodes.title: We Built This Glee Club

episodes.synopsis: New Directions flashes back to 2009 as the original members reveal why they signed up for the glee club in the first place.
Say good-bye to McKinley High as glee club members past and present take a final bow in the stirring series conclusion.
episodes.title: Dreams Come True
